sentences.sentence: But others hypothesize that a new supercontinent will form in a different way.
sentences.translation: 但也有人假设，一块新的超级大陆将以一种不同的方式形成。

sentences.sentence: See "Supercontinent Pangaea Pushed, Not Sucked, Into Place."
sentences.translation: 见“超级大陆泛大陆是挤出来的，不是陷下去的。”

sentences.sentence: Russia stretches across much of the north of the supercontinent of Eurasia.
sentences.translation: 俄罗斯横跨欧亚大陆北部的大部分地区。
